thread.section_title: Babbel.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Babbel.com | babbel.com | 7 von 159
thread.title: Kurt Richter

author: Kurt Richter
title: Kurt Richter
text:
Babbel is much better than other apps out there such as DuoLingo, as it teaches grammar and usage by not only giving examples but also giving you popups that explain rules, exceptions, irregulars, etc.
Vocab is ok, but it does use english-to-target-language translation as opposed to multimedia to identify target language words and concepts. In my experience the latter is more effective.
